G I S T 

G

getArea() - Method in class Triangle
getArea works on a triangle and returns the area of the triangle based on its sides -- using Heron's Formula.
getPerimeter() - Method in class Triangle
getPerimeter works on a Triangle class and returns the sum of its sides -- it's perimeter.

I

isCloseEnough(double, double) - Method in class Triangle
isCloseEnough is essentially an '==' for floats.
isRight() - Method in class Triangle
isRight is a more in depth version of pycheck, checking if any combinations of sides works - using pycheck but switching the order of the parameters.

S

square(double) - Method in class Triangle
A useful function that automatically squares an input

T

toString() - Method in class Triangle
Print out the triangle and the location of its sides
Triangle - Class in <Unnamed>
 
Triangle() - Constructor for class Triangle
Define the unit triangle, with points (0,0), (0,1), and (1,1).
Triangle(Point, Point, Point) - Constructor for class Triangle
Define a new triangle given three points (stored in v1, v2 and v3).
Triangle(double, double, double, double, double, double) - Constructor for class Triangle
Define a new triangle given the x and y coordinates seperately (stored in v1, v2 and v3) Also assign the distance between the points (aka the sides) to three instance variables.
